definition: diaphragm consisting of thin overlapping plates that can be adjusted to change the diameter of a central opening
details:
noun
- diaphragm consisting of thin overlapping plates that can be adjusted to change the diameter of a central opening
= synonyms: iris diaphragm
- muscular diaphragm that controls the size of the pupil which in turn controls the amount of light that enters the eye
- plants with sword-shaped leaves and erect stalks bearing bright-colored flowers composed of three petals and three drooping sepals
= synonyms: flag
